trans-unit.source: Specifies how a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> will gain additional rows or columns after its existing cells are full.
trans-unit.target: Especifica como um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> obterá linhas ou colunas adicionais depois que suas células existentes estiverem cheias.

trans-unit.source: If all the cells in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> are filled and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A> property is set to FixedSize, an attempt to add another control will throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: Se todas as células a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> são preenchidas e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A> está definida como FixedSize, uma tentativa de adicionar outro controle lançará uma exceção.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelGrowStyle.FixedSize> to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A> property on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A> control.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como usar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanelGrowStyle.FixedSize> para definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A> propriedade em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.GrowStyle%2A> controle.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo de código é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> controle.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> gains additional columns after it is full.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> obtém colunas adicionais depois que estiver cheio.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> gains additional rows after it is full.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> obtém linhas adicionais depois que estiver cheio.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> does not allow additional rows or columns after it is full.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel" /> não permite linhas nem colunas adicionais depois que estiver cheio.
